resources.string: This is the help page - here you can find information how to use this app.....
The filechooser you choosed your file with, is not supported. Please use an other one instead.

This application gives you the possibility to ungraph coordinate crosses with an dataline to a value table. You can load your the picture that you want to examine from the gallery or take a picture with your devices camera.
